attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: First off I would like to say that I am disappointed in this app. For some reason the only thing I could see on this app was a big cheeto! I thought this app was to see a president, not an overcooked piece of burnt potatoğŸ˜¬. Why would anyone decide to trick people into thinking this was a good app! All i can see on here is a big ugly cheeto head that belongs to the streets after all of the sex offending he has done in the past. Where is the real president! Now he is doing one of the worst things any person can possibly do in the entire history of Earth. TIK TOK IS BEING TAKEN DOWN!!!  While an angry creamsicle is melting in the whitehouse. I mean who would want to download an app where the main character was a screaming carrot demon.

attributes.review: So I installed the app because I was doing a project on Americaâ€™s worst mistakes ever made and needed information, when I opens the app the app I saw some gross af photos, a rotten old burrito with his hairy chest hair, I wanted to kms because of all the gross things, I now have to go to my local eye doctor to replace my eye balls, also when I wrote my essay the SWAT team barged in my house took my paper and ripped it up after drinking all my choccy milk and leaving a big dump in my bathroom, I highly would not recommend using this app at all unless you want to see things while your going to sleep and wake up in the middle of the night crying because of a small chetto in between trumps legs, -10/10

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Okay, so I downloaded this app to increase my education on politics. I am HIGHLY disappointed in how this app works. It glitches as soon as you open it. It asked for my location and as soon as I clicked â€œallowedâ€, my special jar of childrenâ€™s toenails went missing. Suspicious, right? Anyways, after I discovered that my childrenâ€™s trimmed toenails went missing, I went grocery shopping. You wonâ€™t believe what I almost ran over on my way to Walmart! A freaking giant TOENAIL. It was attacking me and following me. Coincidence? I think not. It was this app for sure! It is cursed and I want it off of the App Store so it canâ€™t curse anyone else. I have PTSD from this. I do not recommend this app to ANYONE. I am very dissatisfied with this apps work.
attributes.title: Do NOT recommend!

attributes.title: Never downloading again ever!!!

attributes.review: First off, when I opened the app a horrific orange image was on there and I couldnâ€™t tell if it was a naked orange fat Garfield type of cat or a big blob fish and it just DECEIVED MY EYES. I was SCREAMING AND RAPIDLY feel my eyes burning. I Had to Rush to the hospital where they told me I lost not just one BUT BOTH MY EYE SIGHTS. For everyone who has an IQ lower than a fifth grader I am using voice typing to warn other about this app. This is unacceptable and unprofessional. This kind of content should be BANNED. I donâ€™t even know why this app is even running up if it causes pain to so many citizens. Now every time I close my eyes I can only visualize that DISTURBING DREADFUL image. Please be safe and not just take this app down for the safety of america but as well if whatever that orange THING was.
attributes.title: EXPLICIT CONTENT

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app it asked for my phone number, address, AND ssn. Good try Mr Trump but I am under age! ğŸ¤¬ So anyways I said NOPE âœ‹ğŸ¼ and exited the app to find that all my other apps had been replaced with duplicates of this app ğŸ˜² I was in complete shock ğŸ˜³ but I figured no biggy its an easy fix right? WRONG! I couldnâ€™t delete the apps and second by second more and more popped up! So I decided to take a break from this mess and go get a snack ğŸ¿but as soon as I left the room I found my whole family (except my little sister who was MISSING) dead â˜ ï¸ and written on the walls with blood was â€œTrump 2020â€ ğŸ˜¥ So just donâ€™t get this app. It will break your phone, kill your family, and kidnap your little sister :(. Very dissatisfied.
attributes.title: Donâ€™t get this app!

attributes.review: as an avid cat hair collector and proud Karen, i was so excited for this app. but as i tried to download it strange moaning noises came out of my phone. i was so mortified and confusedğŸ˜¡! after the app had downloaded, i went to open it and a bird pooped on me. my day was completely ruinedğŸ˜¢ still i continued on. i went to text the number listed in the app and i got a message back saying i had 39 viruses on my phone! after i received that message i immediately went to my local drug dealer to see if they could fix it. there, they told me that i should just try to make the brightness louder. as i did so, my cat kevin passed away. in conclusion, i strongly do not recommend this app it completely ruined my phone and my dayğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤¬
